nbttag: {"id":"minecraft:brown_mushroom","count":1,"components":{"minecraft:custom_name":"{\"text\":\"Mushroom Spore\",\"color\":\"white\"}","minecraft:lore":["{\"text\":\"The life cycle of a mushroom\",\"color\":\"gray\",\"italic\":true}","{\"text\":\"starts with the spore, which\",\"color\":\"gray\",\"italic\":true}","{\"text\":\"germs and becomes Mycelium,\",\"color\":\"gray\",\"italic\":true}","{\"text\":\"which develops fruit bodies into\",\"color\":\"gray\",\"italic\":true}","{\"text\":\"a mature mushroom, and that\",\"color\":\"gray\",\"italic\":true}","{\"text\":\"mushroom will release spores.\",\"color\":\"gray\",\"italic\":true}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"COMMON\",\"color\":\"white\",\"bold\":true}"]}}
